name: OperatingSystemVersion
desc: A structure that contains version information about the currently executing operating system, including major, minor, and patch version numbers.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates an empty operating system version.

items.name: init(majorVersion: Int, minorVersion: Int, patchVersion: Int)
items.desc: Creates an operating system version with the provided values.

items.name: var majorVersion: Int
items.desc: The major release number, such as 10 in version 10.9.3.

items.name: var minorVersion: Int
items.desc: The minor release number, such as 9 in version 10.9.3.

items.name: var patchVersion: Int
items.desc: The update release number, such as 3 in version 10.9.3.
